inclusion.criterion: Liver biopsy with underlying etiology as HBV, HCV, NASH or cryptogenic or ALD (inpatient or outpatient)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: previous liver biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma and was only remarkable for chronic inflammation compatible with a chronic viral hepatitis

exclusion.criterion: Not willing to participate in the study
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient is an alert male with no acute distress

exclusion.criterion: Patients with chronic liver disease of other etiologies
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 55-year-old man diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and recent coinfection with HBV. He is on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.
